noLive: The integrated chatting service for PRISM Live Studio is available after the broadcast has started.

noLiveFaceBook: You can start chatting in Facebook after the broadcast has started.
noLiveYoutube: YouTube chat is not supported for private broadcasts.
youtubeReady: You can start chatting in YouTube after the broadcast has started.
rtmp:
Comments for RTMP-linked channels
can be checkedon the website of the respective platform.

Please try again.

forbiddenFACEBOOK: Facebook Chat is available only when the page is streamed or the timeline is set to public.
facebookNoSend: Chatting is not supported for Facebook streaming.
